attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi,
I am an international Full-Time Student Here in UK Since June 2009.
I am allowed to work 20-hours Per week as to immigration laws. I got National insurance number as well. I go to College regularly.
I got spare time at week ends to work.
I applied For SIA Door supervisor License. They Refused due to right of work once;
I applied  2nd time and now they say that i dont have any right of work as the records of UKBA.
Which law Says That Those Students Who Came With Me or after me, they got it.
and just i am a student who don't have a right of work.
I request to Prime Minister That i paid twice to SIA.
Please Help Me. I got a Lot of Prooves Who Got same documents like Me, But They recieved SIA Licenses In first Attempt.
Why can't I get it.
Thanks

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
